segments.text: Welcome , young man . No offence , but I haven't seen you here before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , this is my first time here . My Mom has a membership here . Here is the card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay then . You are the younger customer here ever .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's not so wise that you do not explore the children's market .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's the marketing's fault , I suppose.What do you want to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I want to become just like Bruce Lee . What should I do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a long way to go , I'm afraid . First of all , you gotta grow up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am still young . And I'm growing every minute .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Then what about trying the treadmill or the skipping rope .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm perfect with my clothes . And I do not have anything else with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's the only place where jeans are not popular . I'd better just go home .
segments.speaker: S2
